entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding roslyn version info in the `dotnet --info` output #44041
  • `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.csproj` is built twice causing PDB mismatch on some platforms #44033
  • Building with SDK 8.0.403 unexpectedly generates WinRT-related code #44026
  • The "ResolveTargetingPackAssets" task failed unexpectedly. #44021
  • Dotnet watch and hot reload does not work in Linux projects when there is a dot in the folder name of the project #44010
  • Allow dotnet-something to be more than executable files #44009
  • Application fails to call .NET9.0 RTM dlls after installing .NET10.0 SDK #44007
  • The .NET SDK Warning NETSDK1214 is inconsistant between .NET 9.0 and .NET 8.0.40x SDKs #44006

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] With 9.0.100-rtm SDK installed, Warning: "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 9.0.100-rtm.24477.19 was not found.." happens when installing maui workload. #43777
  • dotnet test treating xunit skipped tests as failures #43960

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #44038
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetPackageVersion #44029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.2.24474.1 October 2024 Updates #43993
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump OmniSharp Version to latest #44036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update aspire to pull in remaining control changes #43998
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44030
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #43983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #43985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nowarn for NU1903 #44028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #43981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, Branch Lockdown
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #43980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SB Prebuilts Tarball #43979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the 6.0 and 8.0 templates #43954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2556813 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge from rc2 to ensure we have internal flow changes #43987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Dev Device ID #43357
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add Dev Device ID #43360
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-VMR
  • When updating workload versions, don't try to update to an older version, or to the same version currently installed #43931
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #43982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Backports perf fixes to static web assets to RTM #43971
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
